Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server

package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server
This package provides the main functionality to create resource pools and servers.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    me.marcosassuncao.servsim
    This package provides the core functions of the service simulation toolkit.
  • Class
    Description
    DefaultResourcePool
    This class represents a pool of resources.
    ReservationServerUser
    ReservationServerUser is an entity that handles making and confirming reservation requests.
    ResourcePool
    This class represents a pool of resources.
    ResourcePool.ResourceStatus
    Possible resource statuses.
    ResourceStatusEvent
    An event triggered by a change in range of resources.
    ResourceStatusListener
    Interface that must be implemented by classes that are interested in changes in the status of resources.
    ResourceUsage
    Class used to return the results of a query to check the resource usage of a given resource profile.
    Server
    This class is a server that handles work units.
    Server.Builder
    Builder for constructing a new server object.
    ServerAttributes
    This class represents the attributes of a given server.
    ServerAvailability
    This interface for resource availability information.
    ServerHourlyAvailability
    This class implements the information about the resource availability.
    ServerUser
    Entity represents a user who sends jobs to another entity.
